0014: Factorial

Feb 8, 2018 • Gaurav Singh • Pset, 1-Point • p5.js

Write a computer program to read an integer N and print its factorial.

Test Case

Input: 3
Output: 6

How to read an input in p5.js?

What is Factorial?

In mathematics, the factorial of a non-negative integer $n$, denoted by $n!$, is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to $n$. For example, image

The value of $0!$ is $1$, according to the convention for an empty product.
